buildCommand: export PATH="$PATH:$(pwd)/flutter/bin" && git config --global --add safe.directory $(pwd)/flutter && flutter build web --release --base-href /
installCommand: curl -fL https://storage.googleapis.com/flutter_infra_release/releases/stable/linux/flutter_linux_3.22.2-stable.tar.xz -o flutter.tar.xz && tar -xf flutter.tar.xz && rm flutter.tar.xz && export PATH="$PATH:$(pwd)/flutter/bin" && git config --global --add safe.directory $(pwd)/flutter && flutter config --no-analytics && flutter pub get
